body:
.. as of v1.0.2

  • Schemaless and stores any kind of data
  • Extremely configurable (even per-request)
  • REST & PBC interfaces with drivers/clients in many languages
  • Link walking
  • Map/reduce (via Riak Pipes)
  • Luwak - large object storage
  • Riak Search - full-text searching
  • Secondary Indexes *** NEW ***
  • Open source (with a paid Enterprise version)

Not all of these will be covered.
